prod_desc: Spend a day at the beach with Mickey Mouse and friends!
prod_long_desc:
Help your child sit Donald Duck in the speedboat and pull Goofy along on the wakeboard, while Mickey Mouse uses the camera to take pictures from the deck at his Beach House. Little Disney fans will love building and rebuilding this model with a fun vacation theme and creating their own role-play stories. Includes 3 LEGO® DUPLO® figures: Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck and Goofy.
Build the LEGO Disney Mickey’s beach house, featuring opening door and windows, a deck, a boat, engine, wakeboard, tow rope, camera, toilet and a sink!
Includes three LEGO DUPLO figures: Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck and Goofy
LEGO DUPLO Disney building toys are compatible with all LEGO DUPLO sets for creative building
Beach house measures over 9” high, 7” wide and 3” long
48 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 2 and 5 years old
